1.title: The History of Flying and the Space Race

episode of.title: NASA: A Journey Through Space (TV Mini-Series 2016– )

1.plot: Humans have always been reaching for the stars, but despite the path to the moon laid out by Jules Verne, they first needed to master flight.

2.title: Operation: Lift Off

episode of.title: NASA: A Journey Through Space (TV Mini-Series 2016– )

2.plot: As part of the Cold War arms race, the United States found itself engaged in the Space Race, pushing for superiority through technology.

3.title: Shooting for the Moon

episode of.title: NASA: A Journey Through Space (TV Mini-Series 2016– )

3.plot: John F. Kennedy laid out the most ambitious Space Race goal in 1961 - for NASA to send the first humans to the surface of the moon and return them safely.

4.title: The Apollo Missions

episode of.title: NASA: A Journey Through Space (TV Mini-Series 2016– )

4.plot: Culminating in the Apollo 11 landing, the Apollo missions were crowning achievements not just for NASA and the United States, but for mankind.

5.title: After a Giant Leap

episode of.title: NASA: A Journey Through Space (TV Mini-Series 2016– )

5.plot: Having essentially won the Space Race with the Soviet Union, and in the midst of economic turmoil, NASA's priorities are restructured. Apollo 17 marks the end of manned missions to the moon, and the transition towards more Earth-focused missions.

6.title: The Shuttle and Living in Space

episode of.title: NASA: A Journey Through Space (TV Mini-Series 2016– )

6.plot: NASA's space shuttle program allows for easier access to orbit with reusable craft, paving the way for more advanced satellites and the first major space stations.

7.title: The 21st Century & Beyond

episode of.title: NASA: A Journey Through Space (TV Mini-Series 2016– )

7.plot: The International Space Station is launched in the 21st Century, marking a major turning point in international cooperation in space exploration.

imdb.plot outline: On May 25, 1961, President John F. Kennedy made a historic speech where he pledged to send astronauts to the moon before the end of the decade. Eight years later, on July 20, 1969, Apollo commander Neil Armstrong stepped out of the lunar module and made a giant leap for mankind - a step that symbolized one of the most remarkable feats in human history. From that moment on, the exploration of our universe has achieved unimaginable feats with hundreds of missions stretching light years into the distant galaxy. This exciting documentary series takes viewers into the past, present and future of NASA.
imdb.title: NASA: A Journey Through Space
akas: NASA: A Journey Through Space (United States)

Eight years later, on July 20, 1969, Apollo commander Neil Armstrong stepped out of the lunar module and made a giant leap for mankind - a step that symbolized one of the most remarkable feats in human history. From that moment on, the exploration of our universe has achieved unimaginable feats with hundreds of missions stretching light years into the distant galaxy. This exciting documentary series takes viewers into the past, present and future of NASA.::MCE
